metadata.title: CVE-2021-26910 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Firejail before 0.9.64.4 allows attackers to bypass intended accessrestrictions because there is a TOCTOU race condition between a statoperation and an OverlayFS mount operation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26910` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.64.4-1
firejail-profiles - 0.9.64.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.64.4-1').
